subject: p19454978
Findings: Single portable supine AP image of the chest. The right IJ central line has been pulled back in the interval, but still terminates in the right atrium. The lungs are well expanded and clear. There is no pleural effusion or pneumothorax. The cardiomediastinal silhouette is stable.
Impression: Right IJ central line terminates in the right atrium. Pullback of 5 cm could be performed to have the tip located in the superior cavoatrial junction, if desired. No acute cardiopulmonary process.
